thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-La Kaffa International says dividend payment plan for 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-La Kaffa International says dividend payment plan for 2017

organizations.name: reuters) - la kaffa international co ltd

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - La Kaffa International Co Ltd :
* Says it plans to use undistributed profit to pay cash dividends of T$3.7 per share to shareholders for 2017
* To use additional paid-in capital to distribute T$0.3 per share
* To use undistributed profit to distribute stock dividend worth T$0.5 for every one share
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/w9X435
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
